rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with a Vastu-compliant entry that avoids alignment with the main door and a separate guest lobby for privacy.
Open living area designed to promote family interaction, located adjacent to the entrance hall.
Semi-open dining space integrated with kitchen for ease of movement, oriented towards north-east as per Vastu recommendations.
Modern kitchen equipped with necessary appliances and storage, ensuring a separation from the living areas.
Two-car garage designed with proper ventilation and accessibility, located towards the east to allow morning sunlight.
Dedicated library space with adjustable lighting and book storage shelves, positioned in a quiet corner as per Vastu principles for learning and creativity.
Primary bathroom with essential fixtures and a small sink area, ensuring privacy and ease of maintenance.

openings.description: The main entry door placed on the west side to align with plot orientation and ensure proper sunlight penetration.
Large windows for natural light and ventilation in the living room, placed according to Vastu norms.
Windows in the kitchen area ensuring proper light without glare during peak hours.
Automatic garage door for easy access to both cars, designed with security features.
